fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for ConsumerWrapper with 8 test cases covering constructor validation, message reading scenarios, exception handling, and disposal behavior.
recommendations: Consider adding more detailed logging in exception scenarios
Implement a more robust error handling strategy in readMessage()
Add configuration options for timeout and retry mechanisms
fileReports.note: Tests use Moq for mocking Kafka consumer and FluentAssertions for more expressive assertions
